name: Exclusion Zone
description:
The nuclear power plant is damaged and the radiation is spreading and it won't stop. Our only hope is to surround it with a wall.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created for Ludum Dare 50 in 48 hours. Everything (design, programming, graphics, audio) done by Dániel Ambrits (@DanielAmbrits).

Tools: Unity 2021.2, Visual Studio Code, Blender, ChipTone, LMMS with FMetal VST, Audacity, Gimp
